<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>0.2.5</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui.hopscotch" name="Hopscotch" version="0.2.5" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" invalidate_properties="true">
<description> Hopscotch is a framework to make it easy for developers to add product tours to their pages. Hopscotch accepts a tour JSON object as input and provides an API for the developer to control rendering the tour display and managing the tour progress.
To learn more about Hopscotch and the API, check out http://linkedin.github.io/hopscotch. </description>
</plugin>]]></definition> <description>Hopscotch is a framework to make it easy for developers to add product tours to their pages. Hopscotch accepts a tour JSON object as input and provides an API for the developer to control rendering the tour display and managing the tour progress.
To learn more about Hopscotch and the API, check out http://linkedin.github.io/hopscotch.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.ui.hopscotch</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Hopscotch</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui.hopscotch/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.ui.hopscotch</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>0.2.5</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
